languages.text:
Роботизированная конструкция, которая управляется мозгом и нервной системой его основы — собаки. Кибермастифы используются патрульными отрядами Адептус Арбитес для выслеживания и поимки преступников.
Созданные с помощью технологий Адептус Механикус, кибермастифы предназначены для того, чтобы убивать. Они с трудом воспринимают любые другие команды.

A robotised construct controlled by the brain and nervous system of the creature serving as its base — a dog. Cyber-mastiffs are used by Adeptus Arbites patrol squads to track down and capture criminals.
Built using the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, a cyber-mastiff is designed to kill, and has a hard time processing any commands unrelated to that function.
languages.original_text:

Созданные с помощью технологий Адептус Механикус, кибермастифы предназначены для того, чтобы убивать. Они с трудом воспринимают любые другие команды.

Created by the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, a cyber-mastiff is designed to kill and has a hard time processing any commands unrelated to that function.

A robotised construct controlled by the brain and nervous system of the creature serving as its base — a dog. Cyber-mastiffs are used by Adeptus Arbites patrol squads to track down and capture criminals.
Built using the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, a cyber-mastiff is designed to kill, and has a hard time processing any commands unrelated to that function.

languages.text: Ein robotisches Konstrukt, das vom Gehirn und Nervensystem der als Basis dienenden Kreatur gesteuert wird ... einem Hund. Cyber-Mastiffs werden von Patrouillen des Adeptus Arbites eingesetzt, um Kriminelle aufzuspüren und festzusetzen.Der mit den Technologien des Adeptus Mechanicus gebaute Cyber-Mastiff wurde zum Töten konzipiert und hat Probleme mit der Verarbeitung anderslautender Befehle.
languages.original_text:
A robotised construct controlled by the brain and nervous system of the creature serving as its base — a dog. Cyber-mastiffs are used by Adeptus Arbites patrol squads to track down and capture criminals.
Built using the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, a cyber-mastiff is designed to kill, and has a hard time processing any commands unrelated to that function.

traits.locale_text: Ein robotisches Konstrukt, das vom Gehirn und Nervensystem der als Basis dienenden Kreatur gesteuert wird ... einem Hund. Cyber-Mastiffs werden von Patrouillen des Adeptus Arbites eingesetzt, um Kriminelle aufzuspüren und festzusetzen.Der mit den Technologien des Adeptus Mechanicus gebaute Cyber-Mastiff wurde zum Töten konzipiert und hat Probleme mit der Verarbeitung anderslautender Befehle.

languages.text:
Un familier robotisé, contrôlé par le cerveau et le système nerveux de l'animal qui lui sert de base : un chien. Les cyber-mastiffs sont utilisés par les patrouilleurs de l'Adeptus Arbites pour traquer et capturer les criminels.
Créés à l'aide des technologies de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, ils sont conçus pour tuer et ont du mal à comprendre les ordres qui s'écartent de cette fonction.
languages.original_text:
A robotised construct controlled by the brain and nervous system of the creature serving as its base — a dog. Cyber-mastiffs are used by Adeptus Arbites patrol squads to track down and capture criminals.
Built using the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, a cyber-mastiff is designed to kill, and has a hard time processing any commands unrelated to that function.

traits.locale_text:
Un familier robotisé, contrôlé par le cerveau et le système nerveux de l'animal qui lui sert de base : un chien. Les cyber-mastiffs sont utilisés par les patrouilleurs de l'Adeptus Arbites pour traquer et capturer les criminels.
Créés à l'aide des technologies de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, ils sont conçus pour tuer et ont du mal à comprendre les ordres qui s'écartent de cette fonction.

languages.text:
这种机械生物基于活体生物改造而成，通过狗的大脑与神经系统进行控制。生化獒犬通常会跟随帝国法务部的巡逻队一起行动，负责追踪、抓捕罪犯。
生化獒犬由机械修会的技术制造而成，这种活体兵器唯一的使命就是杀戮，很难处理与此功能无关的命令。
languages.original_text:
A robotised construct controlled by the brain and nervous system of the creature serving as its base — a dog. Cyber-mastiffs are used by Adeptus Arbites patrol squads to track down and capture criminals.
Built using the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, a cyber-mastiff is designed to kill, and has a hard time processing any commands unrelated to that function.

生化獒犬由机械修会的技术制造而成，这种活体兵器唯一的使命就是杀戮，很难处理与此功能无关的命令。

languages.text:
Un constructo robotizado controlado por el cerebro y el sistema nervioso de la criatura que utiliza como base: un perro. Los cibermastines forman parte de escuadrones del Adeptus Arbites dedicados a la búsqueda y captura de criminales.
Los cibermastines, obras de ingeniería del Adeptus Mechanicus, están diseñados para matar y tienen dificultades para procesar órdenes no relacionadas con esa función.
languages.original_text:
A robotised construct controlled by the brain and nervous system of the creature serving as its base — a dog. Cyber-mastiffs are used by Adeptus Arbites patrol squads to track down and capture criminals.
Built using the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, a cyber-mastiff is designed to kill, and has a hard time processing any commands unrelated to that function.

traits.locale_text:
Un constructo robotizado controlado por el cerebro y el sistema nervioso de la criatura que utiliza como base: un perro. Los cibermastines forman parte de escuadrones del Adeptus Arbites dedicados a la búsqueda y captura de criminales.
Los cibermastines, obras de ingeniería del Adeptus Mechanicus, están diseñados para matar y tienen dificultades para procesar órdenes no relacionadas con esa función.

languages.text:
脳と神経系によって制御されるロボット化された構造体、そのベースとなっている生物は犬である。サイバーマスチフは、高等裁定局のパトロール隊による犯罪者の追跡・捕縛に使用される。
帝国技術局の技術を用いて製造されており、殺傷を目的として設計されているため、その機能に関係ない命令を理解するのは苦手である。
languages.original_text:
A robotised construct controlled by the brain and nervous system of the creature serving as its base — a dog. Cyber-mastiffs are used by Adeptus Arbites patrol squads to track down and capture criminals.
Built using the technologies of the Adeptus Mechanicus, a cyber-mastiff is designed to kill, and has a hard time processing any commands unrelated to that function.

帝国技術局の技術を用いて製造されており、殺傷を目的として設計されているため、その機能に関係ない命令を理解するのは苦手である。

languages.text:
Temel aldığı yaratık olan köpeğin beyin ve sinir sistemi tarafından kontrol edilen robotik bir yapı. Siber mastifler, Adeptus Arbites devriye mangaları tarafından suçluların izini sürüp onları yakalamakta kullanılır.
Adeptus Mechanicus teknolojilerinden faydalanarak yaratılan siber mastif, öldürmek için tasarlanmıştır ve bu işlevle alakası olmayan herhangi bir komutu işlemekte zorlanır.
